Dear Mr. Gibson:
This letter is a follow-up to the Departmentâ€™s findings regarding the interim inspection
conducted at your facility on 05/25/2022. The purpose of this inspection was to determine
compliance with applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules for Court Operated
Residential Care Facility.
No violations were found. Technical assistance was provided regarding documentation
of references and admission physicals.
Please contact me with any questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need
to speak to someone immediately, please contact the area manager at (616) 204-6992.
Sincerely,
5/26/22
Rorie Dodge-Pifer Date
Licensing Consultant
5/26/22
Jessica VandenHeuvel Date
Area Manager
